name: 埃丝特·阿约·詹姆斯
name_full: 埃丝特·阿约·詹姆斯 Esther Ayo James
introduction: Esther Ayo James was most recently seen in Amazon Prime's Wheel of Time, opposite Kate Fleetwood and BBC's Woman in the wall opposite Daryl McCormack. Her most recent starring role was as Sally in the short film 'Wallpaper'. Her performance earned her a nomination for Best Actress in a Short Film at the Richard Harris international Film festival; and an award win for Breakout Star at the Dublin International Comedy Film Festival. She was last seen on the stage as Ada in Dagogo Hart's original play Mmanwu, for which she was nominated as Performer of the Year in Dublin's Fringe Festival 2023.
